scripts.postinstall: npm run bootstrap && npm run docs:install
scripts.build: npm run lib:build && npm run vue:build && npm run angular:build && npm run testing:build
scripts.test: npm run lib:test && npm run testing:test
scripts.clean: rimraf packages/library/node_modules && rimraf packages/vue-2/node_modules && rimraf packages/vue/node_modules && rimraf packages/angular/node_modules && rimraf packages/testing/node_modules
scripts.lib:build: node .scripts/banner.js lib:build && npm --prefix packages/library run build
scripts.lib:serve: node .scripts/banner.js lib:serve && npm --prefix packages/library run serve
scripts.lib:test: node .scripts/banner.js lib:test && cd packages/library && npm run test
scripts.vue:build: node .scripts/banner.js vue:build && npm --prefix packages/vue run build && npm --prefix packages/vue-2 run build
scripts.angular:build: node .scripts/banner.js angular:build && npm --prefix packages/angular run build
scripts.testing:test: node .scripts/banner.js testing:run && npm --prefix packages/testing run ci
scripts.testing:serve: node .scripts/banner.js testing:serve && npm --prefix packages/testing run serve
scripts.testing:server: node .scripts/banner.js testing:server && npm --prefix packages/testing run start-server
scripts.testing:build: node .scripts/banner.js testing:build && npm --prefix packages/testing run build
scripts.docs:build: npm --prefix packages/library run docs && npm run testing:build && npm --prefix docs run build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:install && npm run docs:build
